original_claim: Probe on 16 generalizing features achieves 0.846 AUROC on gold_106

gptoss_gold106_validation.json.note: Initial probe on all needles (style confounded)

gptoss_generalizing_features.json.note: No probe trained on these features

resolution.method: Ran probe_gptoss_unsloth.py on nigel with Unsloth 4-bit quantization

comparison_to_gemma.note: GPT-OSS slightly outperforms Gemma despite fewer features

conclusion.assessment: Original claim was unsubstantiated but directionally correct. Actual verified result confirms cross-model generalization of AF signal.
